title: DPM Dar, Speaker NA arrive Quetta to participate in Independence Day celebrations
content:
QUETTA, Aug 13 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar along with Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Tuesday arrived here to participate in the Independence Day celebrations.
On arrival at airport, the deputy prime minister/foreign minister and the speaker National Assembly were received by Chief Minister Mir Sarfraz Bugti, Governor Jaffar Khan Mandokhail, Federal Minister for Commerce Jam Kamal, Speaker Balochistan Assembly Abdul Khaliq Achakzai, Jamal Shah Kakar MNA and provincial ministers Bakht Muhammad Karkar, Raheela Hameed Durrani and Haji Ali Madad Jatak, a press of DPMÂ  Office said.
The deputy prime minister will participate in 14th August events in Quetta, besides would hold meetings with the governor, chief minister, PML-N provincial leaders and members of parliament.
